title: How to invest money and become rich what are the best books to read - Quora

response.answer_text: Thanks to A2A… There are many ways to invest your money…Here are few ways:: 1.You can invest in the mutual fund… 2.You can invest in Funds… 3.You can invest in Bonds… 4.You can invest in Stock market…Invest in Stock market according to your Apititute… H.ere are the few that I Personally read and give me much important details about money are:: 1.Rich dad Poor Dad by Robert T Kiyosaki One of the best book for beginners… 2. Learn to Earn by Peter Lunch Beginners books for Stock Market… 3. Think and Grow Rich by Napelone Hill One if the Best Book.. You can also checkout Power of Subconscious Mind by Joseph Mury… Great books for Conscious and Subconscious Mind… . Hope you got your answer… plz upvote the answer it will encourage me… ..
